cpuUtil.description: Specify the average CPU utilization, for example, 50 means the CPU usage is 50%
cpuUtil.title: cpuUtil

max.description: Specify the maximum number of of replicas to which the autoscaler can scale up
max.title: max

min.description: Specify the minimal number of replicas to which the autoscaler can scale down
min.title: min

targetAPIVersion.description: Specify the apiVersion of scale target
targetAPIVersion.title: targetAPIVersion

targetKind.description: Specify the kind of scale target
targetKind.title: targetKind
